title: sorry last post fr
content:
so basically I got 96.7%tile (female quota) and got nit meghalaya cse, iiit bhopal ece, iiit raichur etc, but I chose pes ec cse(kcet). I don't think I made a mistake but I'd like to know which is best now, drop or pes.

And I'm extremely sorry, I'm very anxious and I just want reassurance, I hope yall understand.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1f3zs7q)

comments.body: I think any government colleges in north are that good (sorry if i am wrong tho)
I thought atleast the new ones aren't worth it
I heard ppl regretting who joined new colleges like iiit ap or so and i have seen many people posting how bad proffs in north are (still sorry if i was reading degenerate kids reviews)
Same yaar, getting cse in ec campus but still fomo ho raha hai ki I can do way better .
u r doing partial? or just grinding in college now?
tbh I'm done with this jee rat race

Taking partial drop in pes is pretty difficult . Academics are bit hard and it's hard to manage with jee prep. So will be grinding in clg . Pes is atleast tier 2 clg and literally has best placements after rv .
IIT se move on karna padega
do you think I made a mistake by choosing pes ec cse over iiit bhopal ece and nit meghalaya cse?
I am done too . The way competition is increasing is crazy. I'll get nothing good even with 98ile .
let's leave this rat race my friend ðŸ˜”

Leaving Nit meghalaya is ok . But iiit bhopal could have been a good choice . iiit tag could have helped you . Depends on your interest, might be a mistake but not a blunder . It's upto you how you can improve now.
Leaving one just to join another rat race
Iiit ka tag hota yeah but ur college life would be hell and very hectic even I left new iiit ka ece cuz they aren't very transparent and very bad college life
I got nothing good with 98.5ðŸ˜€
Iiit ka tag nhi ho tha unless it's b/h
True toh hain par feels good to say iiit se hun ig
ðŸ¥²ðŸ¥²
Nhi hein bhai trust me.. People ko lagtha hein sirf iit/nit wale ache hein, iiit wale joker hein
Arrey bhai fair enough ðŸ˜­
ik someone left pes rr for iiit a also
Iiit a doesn't have a tag but has better placements than pes so it's valid..
campus as well
I thought i was the most delusional person, but you clearly beat me with a hugeee margin.
Kitni percentile hein jee me?
Tag ke faide ka matlab placements, peer group, opportunities se tha . Sorry for using wrong words , it was my mistake. Yeah, That iiit bhopal has no significance of its own . Mere bas 94ile aye the.
True bhai, op pehle se dara hua tha tune usko aur daradiya.. Iiit bhopal mein placements he nhi hein.. 50 percent placements hua hein is saal with avg of 6-7 lpa
Okay
